titleStmt.title: A true relation of the late successe of the Kings and Parliaments forces in Pembroke-Shire: wherein the great victory against the Kings forces in Wales by Major Generall Laughorne is fully related. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that this relation be forthwith printed and published: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Laugharne, Rowland, d. 1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
